name: Interview Intruder
description:
Do you worry about interviews? How badly do you need a new job? And how far are you willing to go for it?

Would you break into your interviewer's house?

In this game, you do! Find out all the secret qualities your boss is looking for in you, so you can ace the interview tomorrow!

2d Stealth Pixel Game!

Produced for Rapu Game Jam 2018 Rapu GameLabs

Credits:
